In your own private pool and garden you have reclining chairs and a chair and table set and a superb, inviting pool. At night this area lights up with strategically placed lighting - sit under the stars or back in your open living area admiring from afar.

This place is for you if you want a place to relax in uninterrupted beauty. However, this is also a place for you if you like outdoors and exploring (or perhaps traveling with a mix of both styles of people). The Villas have a custom-built boat that is highly comfortable and sturdy. You can go out fishing with local fisherman (this was a highlight of my trip - a trip out to the fishing farms with a local fisherman and guide in the beaming sun fishing for fresh local Mahi Mahi or Tuna) or take a trip along the coastline. There are also a large number of tours available, Bali's best snorkelling only a couple hundred metres to the west (absolutely breathtaking!), waterfalls only a quick scoot away.

The Villas also include a large completely open area in the front of the complex that consists of beautiful stone paths amongst large palm trees right up to the waters edge! There are more reclining lounges to hear the sound of the ocean as you read your latest book or have a sneaky afternoon nap. Also located in this area is the superb restaurant Warung Kelapa. You will have complimentary breakfast here each morning. This breakfast doesn't disappoint and will often fill you up so much you won't want lunch - delicious fresh fruit, smoothies, eggs, bacon, mushrooms, tomatoes, baked beans, toast and homemade banana pancake! However make sure you also have lunch and dinner - the menu changes daily depending on the freshness of the local ingredients. We developed a large appetite for the most, flavoursome crossiants filled with tomato, bacon and cheese for lunch. The owners, Robyn and Dean (of which nothing is too difficult or troublesome) even put on a daily special on constant rotation for us because we absolutely adored the homemade coconut pancake. 

The staff are attentive, friendly, astute and impossible to fault. They clean your rooms daily to perfection and cook and prepare the food all in-house. 

Make sure you hire a scooter to take advantage of the local waterfalls and scenic locations - the roads are very good and easy to drive. 

We also went over New Years where a special dinner was put on and we had an amazing time with the other guests all around a large communal table. It was the highlight of the trip and we took time out to light our own fireworks off the edge of the water!!

One tip is to potentially stock up on food/drink you want to keep in your Villa at a supermarket in a larger town - Tejakula is very secluded, the cost of say soft drink for example is a little higher and make be harder to obtain (although any troubles - ask the superb managers Budi and Wayan and they will be able to assist).

Thank you Weta, Gede, Made, Ketut, Wayan, Budi, Robyn, Dean and all the staff for creating the most tranquil location I could have imagined.
title: Absolute Serenity

text:
Having just made a booking to return to this wonderful part of Bali again over Christmas and New Year it reminded me to do a Review, though I would prefer to keep this new Resort a secret. The location is on the north coast and the Villas are luxurious and accommodating. I stayed in a Deluxe King Room and am booking a complete Villa with friends when I return. The staff are amazing and nothing is too much trouble. The breakfast is wonderful, freshly prepared each day and any other meals are equally as good. You must try the Tuna wrapped in Banana Leaves as well as the Mahi Mahi. This is freshly caught each day and delivered to The Villas - all of the dishes prepared by Made and Iluh were fantastic and all so fresh.
 
The swimming pool was great for swimming and the snorkelling just off the shore directly in front was amazing. I am not a diver but it certainly made me think about giving it a try. Another must do is to go out fishing or just for a cruise in an authentic Balinese fishing boat, you get the most amazing views looking back at the island. Just exploring the area on a motor scooter is a great way to check things out as well and Budi and Wayan have a number of great tours that they can arrange for you. If you want to have a relaxing holiday and an escape from the normal busy tourist areas then this place is a dream and I cannot wait to return.
title: Another perfect adventure!

text:
After arriving in Tejakula after dark and having some difficulty finding affordable accommodation, we were very lucky to have met Wayan who took us to see the Villas. 
Brand new private beachfront villas, luxurious and tastefully decorated with private pool, lovely garden, well equipped kitchen, big comfy bed, beautiful hand carved furniture etc. All details impeccable, and the price very reasonable for the quality.
The staff were wonderful as was the food they cooked. It was also lovely meeting the owner. We were given a local mobile so we could contact the staff. 
The location was near a temple so we sometimes heard live gamelan music which was delightful. It is approx 7km from the Tejakula town centre so it is useful to have your own transport, however the staff can arrange everything even if you don't.
Thanks to you all for making our stay so enjoyable.
title: all details impeccable

photos.caption: garden and pool area lovely for yoga

text:
This place was our highlight on our 11 day Bali round trip. We stayed 3 nights after hearing about this brand new place at Villa Saraswati in Ubud (same owner). Two things made the stay so memorable:

The absolutely luxurious villas, where everything is perfect:private pool, ocean view, fabulous bathroom, very comfortable bed, fully equipped kitchen, there were even playing cards (which we forgot to bring); everything is spotless and designed and built with great passion; 

The great team performing an outstanding discreet but hearty service: the managing couple Wayan and Budi lead this the team with great dedication so that they anticipate your every wish. Each single staff member was so kind and great in his job. The food, which was freshly prepared in our open-air kitchen, was very delicious. Try the fresh whole Tuna and the Chicken Sate! Excursions with Budi and Wayan were also great fun. They took us sarong shopping, climbing Mt. Batur and see the close Les Waterfalls and were always there for us. They really do care a lot about there guests and even gave us a mobile phone so we can call them if needed. 
Outstanding service and wonderful people!

We love to come back to this place which will even be getting better soon as its waterfront Warung and tropical garden will be finished in some weeks. Don't miss this place! Absolutely perfect for relaxing holiday!
title: Amazing time at The Villas Tejakula!!!

text:
This place is beautiful, we stayed over Nyepi for three nights in a two bedroom villa with a private pool. It was beautiful, the staff are all so nice.
Best place we've stayed in Bali as of yet.
There's a mosque just ears shot away so you do hear this in the morning but it's not to loud.
title: Best place

text:
Great stress free getaway
Wish we had spent more time there
Clean spacious rooms and grounds
Lovely restaurant on site 
Great snorkeling 25 meters from shore calm waters 
Snorkel equipment available 
We booked a few excursions directly through resort
And airport transfer 
Drivers and guides are from resort and very professional in driving and details competitive or less price than outside offers, prep work and follow up thorough in clean van and courteous staff 
City has not recovered from Covid slow down compared to other parts of island so ideal time to go no crowds great price no traffic 
I am sure it will get busy with tourists again soon
Nice to have restaurant on site and fridge stalked for purchase wine beer drinks convenient 
Nice venue spa, tour to my batur and nearby waterfall, great meals private villa all highlights 
Allow for enough days to enjoy, relax and explore
title: Stress free getaway

text: the whole place is immaculate the staff are awesome the food is amazing but most of all the owners are absolutly amazing so friendly and accomodating i will be back to visit and highly recomend to all
title: if i could give this place all the stars in the sky i would

text:
We stayed here at the end of December through the new year for a social distancing New Years getaway and it was perfect! The villas are private with your own pool, and are spotlessly clean. The rooms are beautifully decorated with local artisan furniture and art. Wayan the owner was a spectacular hostess. We absolutely loved her and will be coming back! She spoke good English and was so helpful and welcoming. Wayan is everything that embodies Balinese style hospitality. You haven’t completely experienced the feel of Bali until you come here!  

The villas are located on the East coast of Bali, which has a lot of snorkeling and diving in that area. We loved being able to see the ocean and hear the waves from our villa! It was a wonderful and memorable New Year’s for us! 

We’ll definitely be back!
title: Getaway

owner_response.text:
Dear Jesika and Mike,

Thank you for your wonderful review of your stay with us at The Villas Tejakula.  We are proud of what we have created on Bali's North Shore and are especially delighted when we read a review such as yours which ensures us that even though we are only a small team of staff, we are succeeding in achieving our goal of ensuring that each and every one of our guests is made to feel special and well cared for.

Once again thank you from myself, Budi and all of our staff here at The VillasTejakula.
Sampai Jumpa Lagi and looking forward for your return.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
We stayed in a two bedroom private pool villa with our son in August. From start to finish Wayan and Budi were on hand to make our stay special. They organised everything from sunrise fishing, a mount Batur sunrise climb, Waterfalls, spa treatments and onward travel. The villa was clean and spacious with a lovely outdoor kitchen and lounge area. The overall space was huge.
The food, the setting, the immaculate gardens, the fabulous massages but most of all the genuine and kind staff, makes this hotel a perfect place to stay and unwind.
Thanks Wayan and Budi for a wonderful stay.
title: Serene setting

text: Thank you to Wayan, Budi and all the staff for a perfect holiday. The Villas are beautifully decorated, spotlessly clean and well appointed. Each Villa has its own sparklingly clear pool set in tropical gardens, perfect for swimming and reading by. We really appreciated the friendly helpful assistance in organising a very successful fishing trip, motorbike hire and visit to the local traditional morning market. Even better we were able to enjoy the morning’s catch of  Mahi Mahi for dinner in the Warung Kelapa expertly prepared by Made. We also recommend taking advantage of the Spa Menu for Balinese Massage from Iluh. There are four two bedroom Villas here catering for sixteen guests in total and it would be the perfect venue for a small wedding, retreat, workshop or family celebration. In all a wonderful break for rest and relaxation.
title: Rest and Relaxation

owner_response.text:
Dear Amanda & Gerard,

Thank you so very much for taking the time to write such a wonderful and descriptive review. Budi and I join the staff in saying that we are missing you since you have gone and hope that we see you back again very soon and catch more Mahi2 and other fish.

It is always rewarding for us when we read reviews such as yours which assure us that our efforts have been successful in helping you to relax and enjoy this wonderful part of Bali and all that it has to offer. 

Once again thank you from myself, Budi and all of our staff here at The VillasTejakula.
Sampai Jumpa Lagi.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Our 7 day stay at these villas was unique, in a part of Bali I had not visited. The restaurant is next to the ocean - dining on Made's delicious food while listening to the gentle lull of the waves is a totally relaxing experience. And while you were so occupied, the cleaning 'fairies' would come and  you would return to a spotless room.
The villas are large and beautifully appointed and the adjoining lounge is equipped with a stocked fridge and freezer, and even chilled glasses provided
The managers Budi and Wayan, and their wonderful staff are all friendly and helpful. 
Massages provided by Ilu were of a high standard; background music provided by the sea or the local roosters!
We felt like part of the family by the time we left, and we hope to return
title: Tranquil place to unwind

owner_response.text:
Dear Faye and Nul,

Thank you for your wonderful review of your stay with us at The Villas Tejakula. We are proud of what we have created on Bali's North Shore and are especially delighted when we read a review such as yours which ensures us that even though we are only a small team of staff, we are succeeding in achieving our goal of ensuring that each and every one of our guests is made to feel special and well cared for.

We look forward to your return and we will be here waiting to refresh not only our friendship, but also each of you and to build on the wonderful memories that we have already created together about two Wayan.

Best wishes,
Wayan, Budi and all the staff at The Villas Tejakula
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: From the moment we arrived we felt relaxed and enjoyed the clean, spacious and peaceful surroundings, delicious food and wonderful activities. Budi and Wayan and their staff were very generous and helpful, providing us with traditional dress for a special visit to the temple. They also arranged transport for a wonderful trip to nearby waterfalls and a morning of snorkelling. A massage, with the sound of the sea in the background, was the perfect way to relax before we sadly had to leave.
title: Relax and enjoy

text: We were looking to be transported to a world away and Villas Tejakula didn’t disappoint. It’s quiet and tropical with the Bali sea and and a nice reef for snorkeling and scuba diving just steps away from the villa. Owners Budi and Wayan and all of the crew made us feel more like family than mere guests. And Chef Made’s culinary creations are truly world class.
title: Tejakula get away

text: A beautiful resort in a quiet location far from the hustle and bustle of many of the crowded areas of Bali. The staff are wonderful and very attentive. The food is first class and the accommodation is truly 5 star . We certainly will be back !
title: Bali of old

text: My husband and I decided to have a quick weekend get away and stumbled upon this hidden gem! It was the best find for us! From the room to the food to the atmosphere, it was great! Budi and Wayan were awesome! The staff is so friendly and helpful! We will be back! The rooms were comfortable, clean and spacious! Snorkeling right from the resort was a plus! The site describes a common living space but it is really a lounge area shared between 2 private villas and is so spacious and accommodating you hardly notice anything else! Great place, beautiful views and clean comfortable rooms!
title: Best find ever!

text:
A great hotel, very clean with eye for detail. Wonderful staff lead by Wayan and Budi. Two villas share an awesome pool so lots of privacy. 
Loved the restaurant menu also. The drive from the airport is quite long, so be prepared for that. The Villas are so welcoming that it is well worth it. 
Go see the Sekumpul waterfall, the Les waterfall and the buddhist temple.
title: Awesome place, The Villas Tejakula

text: If you’ve never been to the north coast of Bali then I highly recommend this place. There’s none of the nightlife and hassle of the more popular tourist areas, which suited myself and my wife just fine. The daytime activities consist mainly of snorkelling, diving and fishing, none of which we did because the ocean was pretty rough while we were there. Apart from an early morning trip to Mt Batur we did pretty much nothing but laze by the pool and read books. Budi and Wayan are terrific hosts and all the staff are so friendly. The food at the Kepala Restaurant is excellent. Try the pork ribs, they are sensational but don’t forget to order in advance
title: Great place to unwind

owner_response.text:
Dear Dee & Mike,

Thank you for taking the time to share your experience of your stay at The Villas Tejakula with other travellers. We were delighted to read your wonderful review of your stay with us at The Villas Tejakula. Our main goal is to dedicate our attention to the guests and not only meet but try to exceed their expectations; it is rewarding to know we have accomplished this in your visit  but one think i can't helping with the weather and nature.

We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.
Best wishes,
Wayan & Budi
& The Staff at The Villas Tejakula
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
If you want to avoid the usual tourist traps in Bali then this is a great place. There are 3 villas,each with 2 huge en-suite rooms located either side of a big shared living space open to the courtyard. The courtyard has a private pool of s good size. Each room has a separate entry from the courtyard and they are across a narrow lane (only used for access to a temple) from the immaculate garden and restaurant/bar that is right on the ocean frontage. 
The food and service is excellent, and being small, you get to meet other people and get to know Wayan Budhi and their wonderful staff. 
Plus there is a spa on site.
It is about 3hrs from Denpasar Airport but worth the trip and they will arrange transfers by small air conditioned van.  
And they can arrange day trips plus there is a dive Centre next door.
title: Relax on Bali’s northern coast

text: My wife and I stayed at the Villas for four nights and we loved it. We had only booked a king room, but were given the full villa. We ate at the restaurant each night and truly enjoyed it each time. The setting is fabulous, right at the beach (black sand and pebbles), with a beautiful reef to snorkel in front of the Villas, and a tranquil setting. The staff and owners were extremely helpful and accommodating and did a great job in organizing transfers and activities.
title: Hidden gem

text: Taking a 2 hour ride from Ubud to the Villas Tejakula was a fascinating journey down to the coast, twists and turns, fantastic views and interesting driving. When we arrived at the Villas we were greeted by name by our Host Bodi and Staff member Mane given a smiling welcome, chilled flannels and a choice of freshly squeezed fruit juice. So started our lovely 6 nights in Tejakula. Each Villa complex has 2 seperate large bedrooms and spacious bathroom a shared common room with gas top and fridge. An outdoor courtyard with pool and lounges and all air conditioned. There are 4 identical complexes in total and all separated to allow privacy. The grounds of the recreation area leading to the waters edge are beautifully maintained, the restaurant under the the Bali thatched roof was our Breakfast location but the terrace was where we enjoyed our optional lunch and evening meals, gazing out onto the water and in the evening watching superb sunsets. What a great fined this was. Our Hosts Bodi and Wayan ensured we were looked after and the villa staff were fantastic and always happy to please us. The Villas provided an additional massage room, and the massages were great. Bodi also organised additional side trips to the Waterfalls and cruising on the water looking for Dolphins, snorkeling and fishing. Would absolutely recommend the Villas Tejakula, it was relaxing, warm, peaceful and was Balinese owned and run.
title: Northern Bali Delight

photos.caption: The Dining Terrace of Villas Tejakula looking across to the sunset

text:
I absolutely loved my 5 nights at The Villas.  The room was spacious and beautifully furnished, and the bathroom was simply stunning!  Each villa has a private pool and an undercover outdoor lounge area as well.

Every meal I had was lovely and the dining area overlooks the water.  There is a reef only 20m off the shore so swimming or snorkelling is an amazing experience. 

Wayan and Budi and their lovely staff are all very friendly and helpful, it is a small resort so they know each guest by name.  I felt like a princess the whole time I was there -  I didn't want to come home!  I will definitely be back.
title: Beautiful, tranquil paradise

owner_response.text:
Dear Helen,

We were delighted to read your wonderful review of your stay with us at The Villas Tejakula. Our main goal is to dedicate our attention to the guests and not only meet but try to exceed their expectations; it is rewarding to know we have accomplished this in your visit.

We are also very lucky that we seem to attract so many wonderful from all parts of the world and it is rewarding to us to have you not only choose us in the first place but then to feel that we are saying farewell to new friends who we hope will return again and again.

Thank you once again and we look forward to your next stay with us.

Best wishes,
Wayan, Budi and all the staff at The Villas Tejakula
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
We spent a day at the Villas during our 2 week holiday in Bali. This simply wasn’t enough time to fully enjoy this tranquil paradise! 

The Villa was beautifully designed and sparkling clean! The property looks onto the beautiful Bali sea, which is great for snorkelling and diving. The property restaurant is very good and has ocean side tables. The staff are lovely people, so kind and accommodating. The manager recommended a guided hike to Les Waterfall, which totally exceeded our expectations (stunning waterfalls with essentially no other tourists).

This spot is a hidden gem and is perfect for couples or families trying to find peace, relaxation and a more true Balinese experience.
title: Hidden Gem!

text: This Villa was the first stop on our vacation to Bali and where we had a traditional Balinese Wedding.  It was approximately a three hour drive from the airport with windy hilly roads.  Ms. Wayan arranged for a driver, Gooday, who taught us about Bali on our long road trip.  Our flight was delayed and brought us into Tejakula around 10pm.  Ms. Wayan called Gooday to ask if we would like food prepared upon our arrival.  This wasn't just a sandwich in our room when we arrived....it was dinner by the ocean, full course, including all types of seafood....absolutely delicious and very special.  We went right to sleep so we could be up at 2am to start our Mt. Batur sunrise adventure.  Ms. Wayan also set up our ride and guide which made our lives much easier.  Don't miss Mt. Batur!!!  We came back and received massages, which were glorious.  Then the preparation for our wedding ceremony began.  They really went out of their way to make our day completely special!!!  Our villas was beyond amazing with a private pool, large kitchen, gazebo and small touches like books and cards to play.  The whole property is boasting beautifully maintained plant life and tropical decor and all of the staff and management are kind, beautiful people.  If you are looking for a less traveled location with high end service, this is the place!
title: Paradise!!!

owner_response.text:
Dear Dawn & John,

When we receive such a wonderful review it is our greatest reward. You said we gave you an completely special experience with wedding ceremony, the amazing villa, beautiful maintained, delicious cooked food plus what makes it all come together - an amazing team of staff who do their best to ensure your stay is the best that it can be. To have all this acknowledged and praised is a welcome experience for us and one thankfully that we receive time and time again.

Thank you so much for sharing your experience with future travellers and we look forward to welcoming you both back again in the near future. In the meantime travel safely until we meet again.

Thank you once again and we look forward to your next stay with us.

Best wishes,
Wayan, Budi and all the staff at The Villas Tejakula
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

photos.caption: Balinese Wedding Ceremony by the beach
Wedding decorations in our room after our wedding

text: Holiday in 2 Roms villa with private pool, its a perfect Way to have A vacation in privacy- good food, drinks snorkling and a staff that really takes Care of you and your needs. There is only 7 double Villas, so your in A secluded area...
title: Manager

owner_response.text:
Dear Ninna,Tina and Flemming,

Thank you for your wonderful review of your stay again with us at The Villas Tejakula. We are proud of what we have created on Bali's North Shore and are especially delighted when we read a review such as yours which ensures us that even though we are only a small team of staff, we are succeeding in achieving our goal of ensuring that each and every one of our guests is made to feel special and well cared for.

We look forward to your return again and sampai jumpa lagi.

Best wishes,
Wayan & Budi
& The Staff at The Villas Tejakula
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: This trip was fabulous and so relaxing for everyone in our family.  Wayam and Budi were such great hosts and the setting was just as peaceful as ever.  We had intended to go on many side tours but just stayed at the resort to enjoy the scenery and great food. One day on the water we say hundreds of dolphins and also made a half day trip to the nearby waterfalls.  The entire staff was well trained and the massages were great.  Will for sure come again.
title: Relaxing Trip

owner_response.text:
Dear Pierre,Ibet,Siddney and Madecine,

Thank you alls for choosing to come to Bali's North Coast and stay with us at The Villas Tejakula. You all embraced the opportunity to be in a part of Bali where you could relax, unwind and be a part of a small village. It is always rewarding for us when we read reviews such as yours which assure us that our efforts have been successful in helping you to relax and enjoy this wonderful part of Bali and all that it has to offer.

 I have read your wonderful review to all of the staff and they were so happy that you have acknowledged the effort that they make to ensure that all guests have a wonderful holiday with us and they look forward to your returning to stay with us again in the future, as so many of guests do.

Once again thank you from myself, Budi and all of our staff here at The VillasTejakula.
Sampai Jumpa Lagi.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: This is our fourth trip to Bali, and the best place we've stayed!  Our villa and the grounds were beautiful, and impeccably clean. Budi, Wayan, and the staff family are superb hosts, who made us feel welcome from the start, and throughout our week long stay. The villa and surrounding gardens are artfully arranged, and we enjoyed the privacy and quiet of our large two-bedroom villa and private pool to relax in, and also the lovely ocean front deck to enjoy our meals in the common space. The menu had an impressive variety of choices--including a nice variety of vegetarian options. It is rare for our family to agree on a restaurant because of our wildly different food preferences, so we were delighted to find such a diverse menu, and enjoyed every meal on site.  Everything was fresh, hand prepared, and beautifully presented.  There is not a beach on site, but we snorkled along the reef just off shore. The water was warm, and stairs from the deck make it a pleasant and easily accessible swim in the calm waters, and light current. Gear was available, as was just about everything else that we could have wanted.  Wayan arranged a trip for us, as I had mentioned wanting to spend a day at the beach.  While I enjoyed the water and waves, I was happy to go back to Tejakula, where there were no hawkers, and lots of peace and quiet.  It is a long way from the tourist areas and shops, and this is something to be mindful of when packing, though when I ran out of contact lens solution, I soon discovered that Wayan is the person who knows how to get anything, and I was soon presented with a little shopping bag and a bottle of solution.  Villas Tejakula is a paradise on Earth!
title: Paradise in Bali

text:
We arrived at the villas after 2 long flights and a drive to northern Bali - the villas exceeded my high expectations - it is remote but beautiful and well worth the trip north. Our hosts Wayan and Bhudi were exceptional and arranged for tours and looked after us like family - my daughter's nut allergy was no problem

Pros: our 2 king sized bedrooms with our own pool was luxurious, air conditioning was great, the villa is protected from the wind, the food plentiful and delicious

There is no cons - but of course this is Bali so wifi connection was sometimes weak but that only lasted for 20 mins or so ( I’m stretching here to find something con)

The villas is a 4 star that is better then most 5 stars and the price is ideal- highly recommend and cannot say enough of how great it was!

thank you Wayan and Bhudi!
title: STAY HERE - fantastic: not enough superlatives to do the Villas justice

owner_response.text:
Dear Kathryn,Bill and Nicole ,

I have read your wonderful review to all of our staff and they were so happy that you have acknowledged the efforts they make to ensure that all guests have a wonderful holiday with us.  

We are very proud of what we have created on Bali's North Shore and are especially delighted when we read a review such as yours which ensures us that even though we are only a small team, we are successful in achieving our goal of ensuring that each and every one of our guests is made to feel special and well cared for.  

Thank you also for your understanding of the sometimes unreliable Bali Internet - this is out of our control and can affected by many different factors, but as you said, it was only for 20 minutes.  We look forward to welcoming you back to stay with us again in the future.

Best wishes,
Wayan, Budi and all the staff at The Villas Tejakula
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Wayan & Buhdi run a superb resort with excellent staff. Everyone was friendly and helpful. They arranged a bespoke guided trip to local sites and temples for us and the Di KUBU Spa provided excellent treatments. The accommodation is very comfortable and spacious.
title: Would give 6 out of 5 if I could

text:
I can only second the positive comments of other reviewers.  All the staff were unfailingly welcoming and likable. The food was good and reasonable. We were there in the off season, but felt we were getting their best. The grounds were impeccably kept, the kitchen on its game.
Tip: Let Budi and Wayan arrange a trip for you to the nearby waterfall. It’s a beautiful spot, verging on spectacular. Their personable driver, whose name sounded like “G’day,” showed us some of the plants we passed on the hike up: lemongrass, cloves, impressive stands of bamboo, crocodile trees and even seeds that exploded when wet! 
If you want a place to escape the touristy side of Bali, but still treat yourself well, this could be it.
title: Can Only Echo...

owner_response.text:
Dear Bonna,John and Friends

Thank you for sharing your experinces and write a wonderful review to us . It was a pleasure looking after you and I was delighted to hear just how much you enjoyed to stay with us with our facilities and services impacted your stay to make it an even more memorable experience.  Our staff were so happy that you have acknowledged the effort that they make to ensure that all guests have a wonderful holiday with us and they look forward to your returning to stay with us again in the future.

Once again thank you from myself, Budi and all of our staff here at The VillasTejakula
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: The Villas at Tejakula are a wonderful place to stay. The staff are extremely accommodating, the villas are very large with indoor and outdoor space and a very large private pool. Snorkelling is possible only 20 meters from the beach and we particularly enjoyed going out with a local fisherman. Very relaxing and we highly recommend the Villas at Tejakula.
title: Beautiful large villa with a private pool

text:
There girlfriends travelling in Indonesia, we stayed 5 days at The Villas and loved everything about the resort!
The welcome by Wayan was very warm. The rooms are amazing: beautifully decorated with such eye for detail.
They have thought about everything! We wanted for nothing. Big luxurious bathrooms, large living area with fridge filled with cold drinks. The pool was wonderful just the right size for swimming lapses.
The gardens were so well maintained and beautiful.
The restaurant is situated right on the ocean front and the service is impeccable and friendly. Food very tasty and well presented. On the last evening we ordered “nasi campur” a collection of Indonesian specialities.
Pleasant spa where you can enjoy a massage while listening to the waves.
Thanks to Wayan, Budi, Wede, Ketut, Ulih and all the other staff for making our stay so enjoyable!
title: Paradise!

owner_response.text:
Dear Katinka,Maike & Sylvia,

Thank you for sharing your experinces and write a wonderful review to us. It was a pleasure looking after you all and I was delighted to hear just how much you enjoyed to stay with us with our facilities and services impacted your stay to make it an even more memorable experience. A special memorable one of them is introduce with Balinese name " Nyoman" 

Once again, thank you for your feedback and also for choosing to stay with us and we look forward to welcoming you to The Villas Tejakula soon and Sampai Jumpa.

With best wishes from
 Myself , Budi and all of the Staff at The Villas Tejakula
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
This was our second trip to Bali and we thought we should see more than the beaches in the south so after wandering around Google we settled on The Villas Tejakula, my partner and I are so glad we found this amazing place.

I cannot fault any part of our stay. From quick replies when booking, the gorgeous villas, the stunning grounds and ocean views, the excellent food and especially all the lovely staff who totally spoilt us.

The drive from Sanur was a few hours but so picturesque the time passed quickly. Budi picked us up, he is an excellent driver and pointed out many interesting things as we drove...or we just laughed as he has a great sense of humour.

Despite a bit of rain ( it was rainy season so we were expecting it) and an injured foot preventing me doing all I had planned, such as the waterfall walk, we could not have had a better 6 night stay. My partner enjoyed daily massages while I swam in the divine pool. We tried many of the dishes on  the menu...loved them all. The ribs, fish and the Balinese breakfasts were stand outs.

Thanks to Wayan, Budi and all the wonderful staff for our perfect stay....we will definitely return!
title: Amazing stay!

owner_response.text:
Dear Georgette & Kevin,

Thank you both for choosing to come to Bali's North Coast and stay with us at The Villas Tejakula. You both embraced the opportunity to be in a part of Bali where you could relax and  unwind. I have read your wonderful review to us and the staff and they were so happy that you have acknowledged the effort that they make to ensure that all guests have a wonderful holiday with us and they look forward to your returning to stay with us again in the future, as so many of guests do.

Once again thank you from myself, Budi and all of our staff here at The VillasTejakula.
Sampai Jumpa Lagi
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: I agree with the praise given in previous reviews. This is a place to relax, calm yourself, reconnect and enjoy the Balinese culture and hospitality. The gardens are serene. The snorkeling, just 20m off the front provides a diversity of coral in a huge reef area. The drop off zone would be a great area for first time divers. The sun lounges and day beds in the villa are perfect for lazing and listening to the playlist of tunes provided. The pool is magical for night swims, all lit up within the tropical garden. This would be a wonderful place for groups of friends or family, a romantic stay for couples, or even an ideal spot for a wedding. The villa is all quality, including fittings and although you may not initially notice the small touches, like sarongs or the large water cooler to minimise plastic, the daily flowers and offerings reflect the genuine Balinese nature and generosity of the host. We were fortunate to stay during the spectacular Gulagem festival and we were welcomed to the beautiful temple at the end of the street by the locals. Finally, do yourself a favour, book a fishing trip with the local fisherman for a memorable and fun afternoon out, and enjoy the delicious cocktails when you return. The food, and service is akin to luxury anywhere in the world... but once you come here, you wouldn’t want to be anywhere else.
title: Worth it.

text:
We had the most wonderful time at this beautiful resort. The staff were friendly, polite,prompt and well informed.
The rooms are large, well airconditioned, very quiet and spotless. We were welcomed with a snmile and cold towels to freshen up. Given a comprehensive tour of the property, so we were never wandering around trying to find things. I loved that my husband and I were given our own sarongs to use while we stayed there, nice touch! 
This property is very well maintained, and very private.
The food was amazing. We would watch the fishermen bring the fresh fish in daily, and of course order it for lunch/dinner. I am not usually a fan of spring rolls, but do yourself a favour..they are delish!
Breakfast every morning was HUGE!
Perfect boiled eggs with a rye bread.
And I could go on for days about the fruit...
Ok, I'll stop now. 
We loved every second of our stay, we cannot fault one thing.
See you next year Wayan :)
title: Oasis in the North

text:
The villas Tejakula is a great place to stay if you are looking to get away from the crowed tourist spots in Bali. It is very nice and very clean, food is always good! Staff is always so friendly and nice! 
Would recommend to stay at this villa to anyone!
title: Quite and relaxing place to stay!

text: After narrowly missing the boat to the Lombok quake we decided to visit the northeast coast and boy were we pleasantly surprised. Wayan and her family looked after us in their beautiful villas and although we could only stay for three nights we we’re privileged to witness their temple’s birthday just next door. Thanks to Gede for taking Don fishing in the deep water and the restaurant’s chef for making a couple of meals with the delicious Mahi-mahi. We’ll definitely be back for a longer stay next time
title: Peaceful friendly luxury

text:
We decided to travel North to get away from the tourist areas..., and oh what a gem did we find in the Villa Tejakula...we checked into the villa with Wayan... immediately I knew we were going to have a great stay... she was the best hostess... so lively and friendly... we immediately had made a friend. The villa Tejakula was amazing...everything was so beautiful, the villa was amazing.. we were lucky to have the villa to ourselves for a couple of days...we loved the outside living area and the honesty bar!!.. if you took anything out of fridge you just wrote down what you’d taken...we spent our days around the beautiful pool and relaxing in the afternoon having a massage at the spa...it was so beautiful having a massage and just listening to the waves.. ( thank you Iluh) what really made our stay so amazing was the staff...Wayan and Budi are the most amazing hosts... Budi chatted with us every day at breakfast...he told of his childhood and of his life in Bali ( We left feeling part of his family) but also not forgetting the other staff ..many thanks to Darma who was the mist amazing and attentive waiter... also the lovely young lady who also served us,
and also to ketut and Made  for looking after our Villa .... and to the chefs and also to the staff who
Looked after all the gardens. We truly had an amazing time here... and I really wanted to write this review... but in my heart ❣ I wanted really to keep the place a secret... as I want to return in the future... and hope it’s not fully booked!! But also want to share with everyone what a wonderful time we had staying at this property with the most beautiful people... until the next time 💕💕💕
title: Amazing

text: Stayed at The Villas for 3 nights. Really loved it! The owners Wayan und Budi as well as the whole team made our stay unforgettable! Spectacular view onto the ocean, lovely designed villas with own pool, great restaurant with amazing food. The highlight was to get a Mahi Mahi fish prepared which we caught by ourselves during a boat trip just a few hours before. Do strongly recommend the boat trip including swimming, snorkeling and fishing. Great experience! Very close to paradise 😄
title: Heaven on earth!

text:
Er spend 4 nights in the Villas Tejakula and really loved it. The rooms are spacious and very nicely decorated. The owners took great care to make the guests feel comfortable. The staff is very quick and attentive. There is a beautiful garden and sunchairs under palm trees. We left with much regret. 
Gerlinde
title: Great Stay in the Villas

text:
Thank you so much, Wayan and Budi, for running this little paradise!
We had a faboulous stay which could have lasted longer! The food was very nice, I‘d say you served me the best chicken curry I had on the island! 
The Villa was just stunning and there is really nothing to add about your service, it was just perfect! Ketut and his companions even climbed to the ceiling in my room to find a mysterious animal that kept me awake the first night, which, when we detected it, turned out to be a pair of socks :D We all had a very good laugh about that! We will surely recommend you and hopefully come back one day to meet you again.
Kind regards 
Jenni & Nadja
title: A dream

text: Ideal for two couples sharing a pool and the beautiful area between the double room villas. Everything you need - even great music - is provided, spacious and tastefully decorated villas and bathrooms; wonderful food in the restaurant, we tried almost everything on the menue! The restaurant is set overlooking the ocean. Very helpful and friendly staff! Also the massage parlour is very nice. All in all a wonderful facility, we would travel to Bali again just to be able to stay at the villas again!
title: Best hotel we have ever stayed in!

text:
ncredible stay (6 nights) in this peaceful, luxurious garden villas. 
Everything was just beyond perfection. 
Gorgeous villa with a breathless private pool. 
You got just everything on site to enjoy marvelous days : 
Huge bedroom with fresh sheets smelling incredibly good every day-large and confortable bed. Beautiful Balinese furnitures, several lights and some paintings and sculptures all around the bedroom. Very beautiful and personal decoration to feel at home. 
Large bathroom with everything you need : shampoo, conditioner, soap, hairdryer. Big shower. 
Long chairs with mattress-pool towels-umbrella- table with chairs for coffe- even frites and of course the splendid flowers and trees all around your pool. 
Exquisite cuisine tasty and yummy.
Incredible service like 5 stars palace (special thanks to Gede, Weda and Darma). 
The dinner room faces the sea and the only sound you can hear is the waves. 
Really we were astonished by so many beauty everywhere (the main garden is a heaven).
title: Awsome peaceful stay

owner_response.text:
Dear C-C-L-C-M-M
Wow, what a wonderful review and you seem to have covered everything with your review.    Although it is a long 3 hour journey from the Airport, we are so delighted that all of our guests say that it is worth the drive and that they would do it again.     It is also such a pleasure when reviews such as yours acknowledge the efforts of all of us here at The Villas Tejakula in ensuring that every moment of your stay is a happy and pleasurable experience.
We do hope that you visit with us again soon.
Sampai Jumpa Lagi
Wayan, Budi and all the Staff
The Villas Tejakula
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Stayed here for four nights to recover after a liveaboard dive trip. Situated in a quiet corner of NE Bali, far removed from the chaos and overcrowding of the South, this beautiful complex of private villas with gorgeous 10m lap pools is just the place to unwind. Rooms are beautiful, gardens immaculate and the setting on a small volcanic sand beach with lively snorkelling out front is serene. The food, especially the breakfast, is great and the staff friendly, kind and attentive. The place is clearly a labour of love for the owners. Dont come here if you want evening entertainment, late nights at the bar, TV and lightening fast internet. Do come here if you just want to switch off for a while. Just lovely.
title: Beautiful, peaceful haven.

text:
We spent 4 nights and came back for the 2 last days of our stay in Bali/Lombok also.
This is a great place. Clean, nice, helpful, lovely.  

We stayed several places in Bali, Lombok, Gili's, This was by fare the best place.

The Villas was a haven. Staff was helpful, we  did Snorkeling, Fishing, Diving, massages.  Got Mahi-Mahi during fishing and the kitchen prepared a lovely meal.

We had the Villas and Pools for our self, just lovely ;)
title: Peaceful, friendly, clean, we just loved it

owner_response.text:
Dear Kenneth P,
Thank you so much for your lovely review and we were especially pleased that you came back and stayed with us again before leaving Bali.   We all enjoyed our time with you and hope that you arrived home safely.
We look forward to welcoming you back again soon and are so pleased that you felt this was the BEST place that you stayed.  Reviews such as yours are our reward as we love knowing that we have been able to make your holiday a special one and that we have sent you home with wonderful memories.
Sampai Jumpa Lagi - until we meet again.
Wayan, Budi and all the staff at The Villas Tejakula
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: We spent 3 nights in one of the beautiful villas in June 2018, our best accommodation by far in Bali, food, accommodation were first class and the staff lovely and attentive. Lovely memories we would love to return.
title: Beautiful  relaxing villa

text:
You want to live the high life of the rich and famous? Have a private villa & pool to yourself? Well we did.
Loved everything about our stay here. When we arrived late I did notice that there was someone in the villa next to us. The next morning after breakfast when we came back they were gone.
We had the place to ourselves for.our entire stay.
Bed & bathroom were great. Bed big & comfy. Bathroom beautiful & functional with two sinks.
Wifi worked & was good.
Location was right on the water so the views were just magic.
Breakfast was included & delicious.
Staff were sweet & friendly without being in your business too much.
Got 3 massages each while we were there. 
Very reasonably priced for a hotel spa.

Cons
Everybody else is going to know about it now & we may never get the place to ourselves again.
title: Just loved it. What a place. What a bargain!

text: We spent a week in the Villas Tejakula in June 2018.  We booked a double room but were lucky to get the whole villa to ourselves.  We spent a week relaxing in clean comfortable quiet surroundings.  We have stayed in many four and five star hotels and I can honestly say that this was my favourite place so far.  We had our own pool too and the privacy of the Villa was perfect.  Wayan and Budi were great and helped with any requests we had.  We moved south after our stay to a very fancy 5 star hotel and just wanted to go back to the Villas Tejakula.  We choose this place specifically as they dont allow small children and we were so happy with our choice.  I cant rate this place highly enough and we will definitely go back if we are in Bali again.
title: Quiet relaxing oasis - perfect!

text:
My wife and I spent 4 nights here and were blown away not just at how beautiful the setting was, but also how magnificent the villas themselves were. Location is very secluded and quiet but there is still access to many activities. There is a beautiful coral reef just a few meters from the black sand beach, and not many places can you sit on the beach and see the sunrise and sunset over the ocean.
The staff was amazing and made us feel like family, the food was excellent, and we got massages everyday, some of the best massages we’ve ever had. 
We ran every morning through the village and saw the local market as well as ran to the Les Waterfall.
title: An Oasis in Paradise

owner_response.text:
Dear Peter L,
As The Villas Tejakula is a Boutique Hotel with a total of 8 rooms we are able to give each of our guests personal but unobtrusive attention.   It is such a pleasure to read a review such as yours and to realise that once again our small team of staff have managed to ensure that their guests have left us with wonderful holiday memories.
We look forward to your next visit and in the meantime - travel safely.
Best wishes,
Wayan, Budi & all the Team at The Villas Tejakula
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: From the moment we arrived we were welcomed like family. The staff treated us so nicely I felt like royalty. The Villas are clean and fancy. Each villa has a private room and bathroom and a shared pool and outdoor/indoor lounge area. The pools are shared between 2 to 3 rooms so it is very private. We had professional massages everyday we stayed here. We loved the city because it is not packed like many other tourist towns in Bali. We went fishing on a Bali boat. Snorkeled around the coral reefs and hiked to a spiritual waterfall. The town is only 1 hour from Mt. Batur and there are many things to do in the area. I recommend adding this hotel to your travel itinerary on your next trip to Bali. The volcano has been erupting but Tejakula is 40 km away so it should be far enough away to stay safe. The erupting volcano did not disrupt our trip at all but we got to see smoke coming out which is pretty.
title: Relaxing and comfortable time

owner_response.text:
Dear Ally O,
Thank you so much for your wonderful review and we are delighted that we achieved our goal in making you feel both special and well cared for.    
We are so lucky with our location overlooking the Bali Sea and understand that being away from he busy tourist areas down South that we are always going to be able to offer a different type of holiday for our guests.
A stay with us will ensure that you take the time to relax and enjoy each others company - we thank you again for sharing your views on Trip Advisor and we do hope that travellers continue to come to Bali despite Mt Agung's alert.
Best wishes
Wayan, Budi
& all the Staff at The Villas Tejakula
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Hosts Budi and Wayan will make you feel instantly at home, and you won't want to leave the peace, and tranquility of this beautiful spot. A complete contrast to the bustle of Ubud, you'll relax instantly and be wowed by the stunning villas, with their private pools in beautifully landscaped courtyards, with a large comfortable bed, semi-outdoor showers, and attention to detail everywhere you look. Choose from the menu of massages from the in-house spa (hot stones, traditional Balinese and more) and enjoy your massage with the ocean waves in your ear, or dine overlooking the ocean and enjoy the very reasonably priced and delicious food at Warung Kelapa A La Carte Restaurant and Bar. We highly recommend the Romantic Dinner for Two which you can book in advance (we enjoyed the local seafood and the ribs...and the chefs special pizza). We will be back and recommend to anyone.
title: Highly recommended escape

owner_response.text:
Dear guymcindoe,
Thank you so much for choosing to stay at The Villas Tejakula during your recent visit to Bali.    We are so pleased that you were both able to stop and relax for a few days before travelling south to attend your Conference.     You were such easy guests to take care of and we look forward to your next visit with us in the not too distant future.
Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with other travellers.
Best wishes
Wayan, Budi 
& The Staff at The Villas Tejakula
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: We stayed three nights in the The Villas. It was a wonderful contrast to the more crowded and larger (but excellent) hotels at which we stayed in Kuta, Ubud and Jimbaran. The Villas were perfect for a relaxing stay in a different part of Bali. We drove around the area and were reassured that The Villas were clearly the best location to stay in that region. The ocean and garden setting is beautiful; the villa was modern, stylish and pleasing (we didn't even notice the absence of TV!); there were interesting things to do (eg, snorkelling); the food was wonderfully prepared and was moderately and reasonably priced; and the management and staff were just a delight. Every one of them took time to chat to us and become friends and make suggestions on things we could do. We highly recommend a stay at The Villas.
title: Memorable holiday

text:
My wife and I were travelling with a friend and needed some down time, the Villas Tejakula was the perfect stop. We stayed four days. The Villas are luxurious and very private, each with their own pool and common area. The grounds are immaculate, the restaurant food was always delicious and the staff so friendly. When we weren’t resting by the sea we were snorkeling or the ladies were having a massage. Our hosts, Budi and Wayan made us feel very welcome. Thank you so much.
There will definitely be a return visit!
title: A Wonderful Stay!

owner_response.text:
Dear Terry B,
Thank you for your wonderful review of your stay with us at The Villas Tejakula.    We are proud of what we have created on Bali's North Shore and are especially delighted when we read a review such as yours which ensures us that even though we are only a small team of staff, we are succeeding in achieving our goal of ensuring that each and every one of our guests is made to feel special and well cared for.
We look forward to your return.
Best wishes
Wayan, Bujdi 
& The Staff at The Villas Tejakula
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: I stayed in August 2017. I had a fantastic stay. The villa room was beautiful, as were the grounds and surroundings. All of the staff were superb, particularly Wayan. I was travelling alone and she chatted to me and introduced me to the other guests in a very natural way. I would highly recommend staying here and hope to return.
title: Beautiful

owner_response.text:
Dear Lucapalooza,
We are delighted that we are attracting more and more solo travellers and we thank you for not only choosing to stay with us at The Villas Tejakula but also for taking the time to write a review.
We do hope that we can welcome you back to The Villas Tejakula again.
Best wishes
Wayan, Budi
& The Staff at The Villas Tejakula
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
WOW!!! Such a stunning hideaway of 4 private villas, directly on the north shore of Bali. So peaceful, tranquil and the perfect place to experience the luxury hosted by the friendly and hospitable Balinese locals. Wayan, Budi and the entire team are incredibly detail-oriented.

We were lucky and had the entire 2-room villa to ourselves. Total privacy in our own exclusive villa with luxurious pool!! Heaven on Earth!

The food at their restaurant... absolutely delicious - every single meal. The Balinese breakfast was gorgeous! All fresh produce, carefully prepared. We did not ever feel ill (NO “Bali Belly”). And the bar... generous drinks with NO substituted spirits!!

The massages at their very own day spa are to die for!! And so affordable to have one every day :)

Do yourself a favour and book here!! Even if for a few nights - you will be totally amazed and wonder why you didn’t book more nights.

If staying locally, come and enjoy a massage or facial, breakfast, lunch, dinner or just cocktails while sitting by the lapping ocean-front. All food, spirits & service are TOP quality.

Travellers tip: Please don’t let Mt Agung scare you away. It is far away and enough to be very safe. Besides, on the very rare occasion.... there’s no better place to be “stuck” for a few extra days - haha!!
title: Bali Bliss - Our Exclusive Honeymoon

photos.caption: Stunning flower display to welcome us on arrival (loved it!).
Put your feet up and chill out to the sounds of Bali on the stereo and pool flowing.
This pool is good to swim in (or just laze beside) at ANY time of the day.
Very comfortable lounge/dining/kitchette area - with 2x fans to keep cool.
Succulent pork ribs to sink your teeth into.
Very comfortable lounge/dining/kitchette area - great lighting to suit any mood.
Sit and relax to their Bali music provided on USB and stereo.
The most amazing shower with an in/outdoors feeling - we didn't have any bugs at all!

text: Not a mistake in cleanliness, space, detail of room, bath, restaurant and each and every staff member is seriously awesome, genuinely helpful and kind. So good to be away from the busyness of tourists and meet again the true Balinese spirit. Really great to have a villa for our child and a villa for the adults in a safe secure shared walled-garden compound and large clean private pool with the addition of our own bathrooms and a shared open walled lounge, dining kitchen. Fresh water daily and room serviced each day, fresh food deliciously prepared and no illnesses. Can run/walk a nearby 5km hill loop with sea views, Great doing Yoga with Geda by the beach every morning. Iluh gave the best massages and spa care.
title: fantastic place to stop and recuperate and restore

text: I spent 3 nights at Villas Tejakula when in the area for work- I travel frequently for work and have stayed in many places across Eastern Indonesia- the service and facilities at the villas were on par with 5* resorts, and I could not have imagined a more amazing experience. Greeted by Budi and Wayan, shown to a spacious room, with a shared pool and lounge area, it was clear that everything was well maintained, chicly appointed, and that the entire Tejakula team was in sync to have you enjoy your time there. Great snorkeling off the house reef, incredibly delicious food served by Darma (who also mixes a tasty cocktail!), and cooked by Made- everything was local, fresh, delicious and beautifully presented. It was such a great respite from the hustle of South Bali- I hope I get the chance to return!
title: Serene paradise in North Bali!

text: Last day at the Villas Tejakula, after spending a glorious and blissful week in this beautiful part of northern Bali. The facilities are first class. The rooms are large, well appointed and beautifully decorated in the Balinese style. The bathrooms are beautiful and very big and the in-house restaurant Warung Kelapa, is excellent. The managers, Budi and Wayan and their staff are wonderful, ready to attend to the guests’ every need. I would highly recommend this place for a quiet holiday reading, relaxing, swimming, doing some snorkelling and perhaps hiring a car with a driver and going a little further afield to explore the real Bali.
title: A slice of paradise!

text:
Have just spent a week at The Villas Tejakula on the north coast of Bali and have enjoyed every moment. It is an area of Bali that seems to be less visited by tourists which is part of its charm.
The Villas are located right on the waterfront with access for swimming and snorkeling and are surrounded by tropical gardens.
The accommodation is first class with large rooms and a pool to each of the 5 villas.
Budi and Wayan manage a first class operation together with attentive and caring staff who look after your every need.
The meals at the resort restaurant, Warung Kelapa, are excellent and cover a good range of traditional Balinese,Javanese and European food.
This is a place to sit and relax and take a day trip out two, snorkel, have a lazy swim in the sea or your pool, but not a place for partying. You will need to go elsewhere in Bali for that.
title: Paradise in North Bali

text: After spending nine days of crazy shopping in Ubud and Sanur, I was so happy to have a rest.  The Villa's in Tejakula was perfect.  Beautiful rooms with access to fridge and pool.  The fridge was always stocked with beer and wine to buy. The setting right on the water was so serene.  The snorkeling in front of The Villa's was absolutely great.  There is a dive shop next door for those into scuba.  We mainly stayed at the property for meals and rest. The food is wonderful at the restaurant which also has a bar.  Prices were very reasonable.  Close by are excursions to waterfalls, snorkeling and local crafts. Do your shopping in Ubud.  The staff was always there to take care of any needs that might arise.   If you should need help with transportation or excursions, the owners will take care of everything.  I will return to the Villa's in Tejakula.  I highly recommend this property for rest and relaxation.
title: Hidden Gem

text: What a beautiful place to stay. We were giving workshops at a nearby school, but had enough free time to enjoy The Villa. We ate dinner there all three nights. The food is very reasonably priced and delicious. Breakfast was included each day. We enjoyed the traditional Balinese breakfast twice because it was so good. There's a diving center next door that we used twice. We would love to come back. This would be a wonderful place to come with our family (children and grandchild)
title: Beautiful Villa, wonderful staff

photos.caption: We shared this pool with one other room. Just two rooms to a villa. Lovely.

text: The Villas Tejakula is a hidden oasis in Bali's north, offering a stunning outlook to the ocean and beautiful tropical gardens. I stayed in a two bedroom villa with my husband, which offered us a private pool and ample space for two people. Each villa is beautifully constructed with high ceilings and lovely craftsmanship. The staff and owners are friendly and accommodating, making your stay carefree.  The thoughtful additions of an outdoor shower, a fridge and a private supply of drinking water make The Villas Tejakula stand out. The drive to The Villa Tejakula from Ubud offered us the opportunity to see Kintamani and incredible views of Mount Batur and Mount Agung.  Definitely recommend The Villas Tejakula as as base for exploring northern Bali.
title: Beautifully appointed villas with an oceanview

text:
Where to begin? We had very high expectations of The Villas Tejakula after reading all the wonderful reviews here. Our expectations were exceeded ten-fold. Our stay at Villas Tejakula was better than we could have imagined. From the staff, to the food, to the villas themselves - everything was impeccable. 

The staff were extremely friendly, went out of their way to be helpful, and we were struck not only by their professionalism but also their dedication and pride in their work. The Villas Tejakula should be commended for bringing together such a fine group of people. 

The food was fantastic! The menu was varied, well-priced and, most importantly, absolutely delicious. We never tempted to go anywhere else. The staff, again, were wonderful. We loved seeing Weda, Darma (his cocktails are fabulous!) and Gede each day. 

The villas are gorgeous. Each bedroom is beautifully appointed, the bathroom is exquisite, and the outdoor seating area was a lovely place to relax. Having a pool to share between two villas is a great touch. 

Finally, as many of the previous reviewers have noted, Budi and Wayan are fantastic. They are consummate hosts. They take care of their guests as if their guests are being welcomed into their own home. We were so grateful for their warmth, their suggestions on what we could do each day - and finally, on our last day, being sent off with a hearty breakfast despite our early start. 

Two more quick points: firstly, the Spa is well worth a visit - Iluh’s facials in particular are sublime - and secondly, it is worth noting that Mt Agung is approximately 50 km away from Tejakula. It is therefore well out of range of danger in the event of an eruption!
title: Amazing experience

owner_response.text:
Dear Andrew R,

We were delighted to read your wonderful review of your stay with us at The Villas Tejakula.  Our main goal is to dedicate our attention to the guests and not only meet but try to exceed their expectations; it is rewarding to know we have accomplished this in your visit.

We are also very lucky that we seem to attract so many wonderful from all parts of the world and it is rewarding to us to have you not only choose us in the first place but then to feel that we are saying farewell to new friends who we hope will return again and again.

Thank you once again and we look forward to your next stay with us.

Best wishes,
Wayan, Budi and all the staff at The Villas Tejakula
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
We were so happy that we made a wise choice to stay in this lovely villa for a short four-day trip to Bali to de-stress ourselves. It is located in Tedjakula, the north part of Bali island, suitable for people who seek experiences different from the touristy part of Bali. 

       Each villa has two beautiful, spotless, spacious rooms, with a shared living room/kitchen area and a nice little private pool. We had the luxury to have the whole villa to ourselves as managers Wayan and Budi purposefully give every guest as much privacy as possible during the time the villas are not fully occupied. There is a gorgeous garden outside the villas, facing the sea and black rocky beach, peaceful and idyllic. 

        The food and drinks are fresh and nice with reasonable prices. We liked best was the freshly grilled tuna wrapped in a banana leaf. And we enjoyed the massage, too, which helped relieve my back pain. 

      All the staff are so nice to us the whole time. They do their best to meet our every request and we enjoyed chatting with each of them. We were so impressed by their spontaneous, hearty smiles, which open a window for us to explore more about the local cultures and the religious faith. 

       Budi helped us arrange a couple of tours to a few places of interest in the north, and what we like most is the Water Palace and the Buddhist Monastery. Staying in Tedjekula, though 3-4 hours drive from airport, allowed us to have a glimpse of the fascinating, authentic Balinese cultures and local life, so it is totally worth for us. 

        All the best Villas Tedjakula! Hope that one day we will go back.
title: Exceptional!

owner_response.text:
Dear Michelle D,

Thank you for sharing your experience of your recent stay at The Villas Tejakula.   You were both so tired when you arrived and although it was only a short break from your busy lives, it was our reward to then farewell you knowing that we had helped you both to relax and to see that you enjoyed every aspect of your time with us.
We hope that you will return as soon as you can snatch some time again and we will be here waiting to refresh not only our friendship, but also each of you and to build on the wonderful memories that we have already created together.
Best wishes
Wayan, Budi & the Staff at The Villas Tejakula.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: The small size of the hotel together with very friendly/professional staff and the kindness of the 2 owners Wayan and Budy, make you feel at home. Rooms and bathroom are large and very well furnished; they have a private swimming pool, but are not directly facing the see. The beach is very small and made of black volcanic rocks, but the reef is very nice and full of fishes (perfect for snorkling or diving from the nearby center). The hotel is located in a non touristic are of Bali, so it's far from caos, while it's easy to organise in the surroundings great walks in the forest/waterfalls, bike tours and visit to unspoiled - though with volcanic black send - beaches.
title: Cosy, small size hotel on the see

owner_response.text:
Dear ED060,
When it was time for you to go we also wished that you had booked to stay for longer - next time !!  It was a pleasure to take care of you and wonderful to know that we saw you off with some wonderful lasting memories of your stay with us.   
We look forward to your return.
Best wishes
Wayan, Budi & the Staff at The Villas Tejakula
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
I can’t add more to the rave reviews already posted, except to affirm they are true and to thank the amazing staff for a wonderful stay. I literally get like part of the family, and was wowed by the hospitality. 
The villa was beyond beautiful, private on a black sandy beach with amazing snorkeling just outside. I’m coming back as soon as possible, this time with my family.
title: A piece of authentically Balinese heaven

owner_response.text:
Dear Priya Y,
You may have arrived as our guest, but we certainly felt that we were saying farewell to one of our family when it was time for you to go.  We know that we will surely welcome you back again soon and we can assure you that we will ensure that your next visit is even better than your first.
With best wishes
Wayan, Budi & the Staff at The Villas Tejakula
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
The Villas Tejakula is the most amazing beach side resort I have been too.

After staying  at Villa Sarawak, I just had to try the owners other resort, The VillasTejakula. 

Upon a scenic 1.5hr drive north to the coast of Bali too Tejakula, I arrived to the most amazing villas I have seen. PICTURES DO  NOT DO JUSTICE.

Each villa (there are 4 separate), has 2 bedrooms and each a private pool. The grounds are lush, the restaurant has such a great variety too choose from and the cocktails are a must.

Located on the grounds is its own private day spa, during my stay I had to try a different massage each day. 

The staff will go above and beyond too make you feel at home and nothing is to hard food them. 

This is a stunning night g tranquil oasis on the sea, I'm so glad I didn't let Mt Agung keep me away, we were not affected at all. 

I will be back here to stay without a doubt.
title: TRANQUIL OASIS ON THE SEA

owner_response.text:
Dear Sally D,

We were delighted that having stayed at Villa Saraswati many times you decided to travel north on this last visit to also spend time with us at The Villas Tejakula.
It is indeed a beautiful drive from Ubud to our location on the north coast overlooking the Bali Sea and the staff all enjoyed ensuring that you had a wonderful time.    It was sad to say goodbye but we know that we will welcome you back again soon as you have already made your onward booking for your next Bali visit.
So we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.
Best wishes
Wayan, Budi and all the Staff at The Villas Tejakula

text: I enjoyed my stay at THE VILLAS TEJAKULA very peaceful, and very near to beach. Very romantic place to stay.. the food was awesome and good hospitality especially the view from hotel was awesome.. thank you..
title: Fentastic hotel

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: I travelled though Bali for over two weeks staying at a number of locations. IT was sort of a scouting mission for future vacation travel.  Without a doubt, the Villas Tejakula was my favorite location and I look forward to going back.  It was a combination of stunning accommodations, attentive and professional staff, as well as a breathtaking location that made for the perfect stay.  On my travels I stayed at a number of places throughout the island, including the forests above Ubud to the sun drenched beaches of the southern part of Bali.  The north part of the island really has it all.  The calm ocean waters, good snorkeing, a slower pace of life and much fewer tourists make this an ideal landing spot for couples and families alike.  The service, staff, accommodations and location for the villas is ideal. I look forward to my return,
title: Best location in Bali, stunning accomodations

owner_response.text:
Dear Tom K,
Thank you for your wonderful review of your stay with us at The Villas Tejakula.    It is only by guests such as yourself taking the time to write a review that future travelers can decide to travel north, over Mt Batur to our beautiful coastline and the peaceful destination that is waiting for you at Tejakula.
You will be delighted to know that we have just been awarded our first Travelers' Choice Award and we hope that it will be followed by many more.
Once again thank you for choosing to spend time with us at The Villas Tejakula and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.
All the best
Wayan, Budi and all of the Staff at The Villas Tejakula
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: I spent one wonderful night here on my way along the north coast and it was perfect. You shouldn't be at all worried about visiting while the volcano it rumbling (it's about as far from Agung as Ubud is). The staff are wonderful and the villas are very private with their own pool. When I'm along the north coast next, I'll definitely be staying for more than one night (and I'll bring friends).
title: Easily the best North Bali has to offer!

text: On our way to Amed, we had a wonderful lunch. Perfect view of the ocean, very nice staff and quite atmosphere. The fish curry was excellent as was the mahi-mahi and hamburger. Really fresh and tasty. The resort looked really nice and tranquil.
title: Very nice lunch.

text: In case you want action and the possibility to pick and choose among restaurants, Tejekula is not for you. But if you want to wind down and just relax for same time the Villas Tejakula is the perfect choice. The romm are large, clean and necely decorated, the bath romm is just fabulous. The familiarity and the service level is just incredible. Highly recommended.
title: As a home away from home and a family away from family

owner_response.text:
Dedar Mikael W,
Thank you for choosing to stay with us here at The Villas Tejakula and then to also stay at our sister Hotel, Villa Saraswati in Ubud.   You were delightful guests and we enjoyed meeting and talking with you.
